Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: I had a similar experience when I lost weight from 8th grade to high school. I was a huge dork and got bullied really bad. I lost 20lbs and showed up to freshman year in all new trendy clothes. Suddenly the popular kids from other schools were all really nice to me. I got a date to homecoming. Then when the popular kids who used to be mean to me started treating me differently I lost it. It all felt so fake. It didnt feel like how I expected. It was empty.

Author: livipup
Text: Most guys who bother to say nice things to girls are really gross. I don't know how many compliments from men that I've received alongside a hand on my ass. I don't think it's that you're not deserving of love, just that you deserve better than the kind of person who's likely to give you attention.
